# Common Utilities

This section documents shared enums, health checks, and other utility modules used throughout PyTestLab.

---

## Enums

::: pytestlab.common.enums
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_category_heading: false

---

## Health Checks

::: pytestlab.common.health
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_category_heading: false
